summary: Both REQ-10 and REQ-11 are fully implemented in the diff. AuthContext.tsx has been updated with the correct default credentials (AnuragSingh/Anurag@123), sessionStorage-based credential persistence, and a changeCredentials function. AdminDashboardPage.tsx includes a Settings tab with all required form fields, validation logic (wrong current password, mismatched passwords), and success/error messaging. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were found.
